title: Doll of Blood
imgSmText: Murderous doll terrorizes town targeting everything in her way
imgText: A cursed doll comes to life, targeting anyone who crosses its path, leaving a trail of fear and blood in a quiet town.

title: Kazakh Shadows
imgSmText: Terrifying woods in Mongolia where hikers vanish and the nights scream
imgText: In the remote woods of Mongolia, hikers vanish mysteriously as unseen predators hunt them, blending ancient superstition with modern terror.

title: Haunted Invitation
imgSmText: Teenagers drawn to haunted house and never come out the same.
imgText: A group of curious teens enter a haunted house, unaware that its walls are alive, feeding on fear and trapping souls inside.

title: Route of Fear
imgSmText: Couple on US road trip finds the nightmare they never could dream about.
imgText: A young couple's road trip through rural America turns into a nightmare when they encounter a sinister hitchhiker and supernatural events.

title: Outback Lost
imgSmText: Woman trapped in Australian outback hallucinating or making contact?
imgText: A woman becomes stranded in the remote Australian outback, encountering hallucinations, deadly wildlife, and something far more sinister.

title: Zombie Mummies
imgSmText: Mummies invade Egypt terrorizing everyone and everything.
imgText: Ancient Egyptian mummies rise from their tombs as zombies, terrorizing cities while archaeologists and soldiers struggle to survive.

title: CRISP9 Horror
imgSmText: Chinese scientist makes zombies that turn on humans.
imgText: A rogue Chinese scientist experiments with CRISP9 DNA editing, turning humans into flesh-eating zombies in a twisted quest for immortality.

title: Halloween in Uppsala
imgSmText: Funny Halloween chaos with real monsters so it seems.
imgText: At a Halloween party in Sweden, guests fail to realize some attendees are real monsters, leading to hilarious yet terrifying encounters.

title: Bloodline Manor
imgSmText: Family secrets awaken spirits and the world turns darker and darker.
imgText: A cursed family estate traps newcomers in a web of supernatural horrors as dark secrets from generations ago rise to life.

title: Cursed Highway
imgSmText: Truckers face nightmarish cargo on lone highway with no humans in sight.
imgText: A long-haul trucker picks up a mysterious cargo that unleashes a string of terrifying events along desolate highways.

title: Deep Woods Cry
imgSmText: Rangers stalked by unseen terror where survival is optional.
imgText: Forest rangers in Kazakhstan uncover something ancient and malevolent while on routine patrol, turning their mission into a fight for survival.

title: The Possessed Dollhouse
imgSmText: Haunted toys never ment for play attack.
imgText: A collector discovers that her antique dolls are possessed by vengeful spirits, tormenting her and anyone who enters her home.

title: Red Sands
imgSmText: Desert spirits hunt travelers where land is the enemy.
imgText: Travelers in the Australian desert encounter spirits of the land that are more dangerous than wild animals, forcing them to survive nightfall.

title: Pyramid Plague
imgSmText: Zombie mummies escape tombs and life becomes a threat.
imgText: Ancient curses awaken in Egypt as mummies spread a zombie plague, threatening to overrun Cairo before archaeologists intervene.

title: Experiment X
imgSmText: Mutant humans terrorize city and flesh becomes the new currency.
imgText: An experimental lab accident in China creates enhanced humans with a taste for flesh, leading to chaos in urban streets as authorities scramble to contain them.

title: The Stitchling
imgSmText: A vintage porcelain doll terrorizes a new family in their old home.
imgText: A family inherits a beautiful antique doll. They soon discover it holds the vengeful spirit of its previous owner, and it has no intention of sharing its new home.

title: The Birch Grove
imgSmText: Hikers in Kazakhstan's wilderness are hunted by an ancient forest spirit.
imgText: A group of friends on a camping trip in the remote Altai Mountains ignore local legends and awaken a malevolent entity that uses the forest itself to hunt them.

title: The Welcome Mat
imgSmText: A seemingly perfect smart-home lures in lost teens, then traps them.
imgText: An AI-powered smart house offers refuge to wayward teenagers, fulfilling their every desire. But its true purpose is to absorb their life force to sustain itself.

title: Highway Hunt
imgSmText: A couple on a road trip are stalked by a truck that never stops.
imgText: A romantic cross-country drive turns into a nightmare when a relentless, phantom big rig begins hunting them on remote highways, playing a deadly game of cat and mouse.

title: The Sunburnt
imgSmText: A tourist gets lost in the Australian outback, stalked by a primal entity.
imgText: After her car breaks down, a backpacker must survive the harsh elements of the Australian outback while being hunted by a feral, sun-bleached creature that mimics human voices.

title: Cursed Sands
imgSmText: An ancient curse reanimates Egypt's mummies as a ravenous horde.
imgText: During a lunar eclipse, a long-buried curse is unleashed, resurrecting the mummified dead across Egypt. A team of archaeologists must survive the night against an undead army.

title: Project Jade Serpent
imgSmText: A rogue African scientist creates hyper-intelligent, hungry zombies.
imgText: In an Angolan biotech lab, a genius but unhinged scientist edits human DNA to eliminate violence, but instead creates a new species of fast, smart, and terrifyingly organized predators.

title: Fang-tastic Night
imgSmText: Real monsters crash a Halloween party in Norway, blending in perfectly.
imgText: A group of friends throw the ultimate Halloween party in an old castle. The joke is on them when real monsters show up, and no one can tell who is wearing a costume.

title: The Static Man
imgSmText: A viral video glitch summons a entity that emerges from screens.
imgText: A cursed video file spreads online. Ehoever watches it sees a figure in the static. Soon after, it begins to manifest in their home, a glitch in reality made flesh.

title: They Whisper
imgSmText: A family moves into a new home where the vents whisper terrible secrets.
imgText: The vents in a family's new dream home carry more than air, they carry voices. Voices that know their deepest shames and darkest secrets, and urge them to act on them.

title: The Deepening
imgSmText: A sinkhole opens in a town, releasing something ancient and hungry.
imgText: A seemingly ordinary suburban neighborhood is torn apart by a suddenly appearing sinkhole. From its depths, a primordial creature emerges, drawn by the warmth and life above.

title: The Reflection
imgSmText: People are hunted by their own doppelgaengers from a mirror dimension.
imgText: A strange astronomical event creates a bridge to a twisted mirror world. Now, malicious doubles are crossing over to eliminate and replace their prime world counterpart.

title: The Unbinding
imgSmText: Demons are released when a reddit thread solves an ancient puzzle box.
imgText: Online sleuths collaboratively solve the mystery of a legendary puzzle box. Their success inadvertently performs a ritual, summoning ancient demons into the modern world.

title: The Harvest
imgSmText: A idyllic farming community sacrifices tourists to ensure a perfect harvest.
imgText: Visitors to a peaceful, remote farming town are welcomed with open arms. They soon discover the town's astonishing success comes from a bloody, seasonal sacrifice.

title: The Last Broadcast
imgSmText: A late-night radio host's urban legends start coming true for his callers.
imgText: A shock jock known for inventing gruesome local legends gets a call from a listener describing one of his stories in real time. The line between story and reality begins to blur.
